title: Oil rises as U.S.-China trade comments calm markets
text: Oil prices rose on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump predicted a trade deal with China after positive comments by Beijing, calming nerves after a round of tit-for-tat tariff hikes had sent markets reeling.

title: Asia stocks, bond yields climb as trade war fears ebb
text: Asian stocks rose in step with their global peers while safe-haven bonds retreated on Tuesday, as signs Sino-U.S. trade hostilities might be easing for now helped restore investor confidence after the previous session's rout.

title: Japan automakers need not worry about U.S. trade talks outcome: Motegi
text: Japanese Economy Minister Toshimitsu Motegi said on Tuesday he did not think U.S.-Japan trade talks would result in an outcome that would cause concern for Japanese automakers.

title: Stocks jump after Trump says he wants trade deal with China
text: Wall Street stepped back into stocks Monday after President Trump signaled — yet again — that he wants to work out a trade deal with China. Early Monday, President Trump told reporters that the two countries would be “getting back to the table” to try to hammer out a trade deal.

title: Oil rises after Trump says China trade deal likely
text: Oil prices rose on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump said he expected to sign a trade deal with China, calming nerves after a round of tit-for-tat tariff hikes had sent markets reeling.

title: Cramer explains why investors should be careful with futures markets
text: Jim Cramer puts on his pajamas to break down for viewers they are made for sleeping, not trading in the after hours.

title: Investors should 'be prepared for more pain' and buy it
text: If your business depends on China for its sales, or its supplies, you're going to pay a price here and the White House doesn't care if those stocks go down.

title: Stocks surge as Trump says China wants trade deal

title: CNBC's interview with Secretary Rick Perry and former Citigroup CEO Sandy Weill

title: I think Trump has learned his lesson after market volatility, says Art Cashin

title: Why UBS Global Wealth Turned Bearish on Stocks
text: Jason Draho, UBS Global Wealth Management head of Americas asset allocation, explains why he's turned bearish on U.S. stocks. He speaks with Bloomberg's Joe Weisenthal, Lisa Abramowicz, Caroline Hyde and Luke Kawa on "Bloomberg Markets: The Close."

title: Flattening Yield Curves Speak For High Yield Paper
text: The search for risk-free positive yields, worldwide, drives down our interest rates on Treasuries, just 2% on 30-year paper and wavering. Meanwhile, the fear of recession spreads, keeping a lid on high-yield paper, BB credits and below.

title: Bespoke's Pearkes on how markets should handle Trump's trade tweets
text: George Pearkes, analyst at Bespoke Investment Group, joins CNBC's "Closing Bell" to discuss whether the markets are accurately pricing in trade uncertainty and what they should do when President Donald Trump tweets trade news.

title: Trump's aggressive, mixed signals on China whiplash Wall Street

title: Stock Market Today: Biotech in Focus, Trade Talks Steady Stocks

title: U.S. business investment appears to struggle in third quarter
text: New orders for key U.S.-made capital goods rose modestly in July while shipments fell by the most in nearly three years, pointing to continued weakness in business investment and a slowdown in economic growth early in the third quarter.
